test_documents.title: Apple Inc. Company Profile
test_documents.content: Apple Inc. is a technology company founded in Cupertino, California in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne.

test_documents.title: Google's Silicon Valley Headquarters
test_documents.content: Google was founded in California by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were PhD students at Stanford University.

test_documents.title: Tesla Manufacturing Facilities
test_documents.content: Tesla operates manufacturing facilities in California, Nevada, and Texas, producing electric vehicles and energy storage systems.

test_documents.title: New York Stock Exchange Overview
test_documents.content: The New York Stock Exchange is located in Manhattan, New York and is one of the largest stock exchanges in the world.

test_documents.title: Transformer Architecture for Natural Language Processing
test_documents.content: This paper introduces the Transformer model architecture for machine learning applications in natural language processing and artificial intelligence.

test_documents.title: Deep Learning Applications in Computer Vision
test_documents.content: Research on deep neural networks and their applications in computer vision tasks, including image recognition and object detection.

test_documents.title: Database Management Systems Performance
test_documents.content: Analysis of database query optimization techniques and performance improvements in relational database management systems.
